data.actual_result: On Android the link is parsed with the mention in it. Personally I found this bug when pasting a link ending with an anchor tag (#) that matched with a channel name.
data.expected_result: As on desktop, the link should end before the mention
data.short_description: Putting a mention right after a link will include the mention inside the link
data.steps_to_repro: - In the chat input, paste a link.  - Append a mention right after the link, without space between. It should look like this  (e.g https://www[dot]google[dot]com[at/hash]mention (replace with correct symbols)
